title: Who has been the second greatest rapper of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is 2019's Top 8 Rappers in the World: Kendrick Lamar. Kendrick Lamar is an American rapper, songwriter, and record producerDrakePusha T.Kodak BlackXXXTentacionEminemMeek MillTory LanezBut the question says 2nd greatest rapper. Its Drake as you can see. For those who don't know Drake, this is how he looks like:  Description Aubrey Drake Graham is a Canadian rapper, singer, songwriter, record producer, actor, and businessman. Drake gained recognition as an actor on the teen drama television series Degrassi: The Next Generation in the early 2000s. Born: October 24, 1986 (age 33 years), Toronto, Canada Full name: Aubrey Drake Graham Net worth: US$150 million (2019) (estimate)

the first i would say, would be Eminem, he has everything and is the most successful hip hop artist ever, jay z i would say would be #2, his net worth is 1 billion dollars, and he has broken tons of selling records and is a great artists, lyricist, and rapper over all.
